summary: A plumber, Paul, is suspicious of his neighbor in an apartment house. He suspects his neighbor of being dishonest due to some peculiar things that have happened recently. Ms. Franklin had a pearl necklace that disappeared from her trunk. Brad Carson had an expensive coin collection that went missing from an artificial book on his bookshelf. Paul is uncomfortable suspecting his neighbor but can't shake off the feeling that something is off.
quotes: many partic peculiar peculiar things had happened recently
kept his expensive coin collection in an artificial book on his bookshelf
